issue.title: [CI] Kartothek nightly integration build is failing because of Parquet statistics date change
issue.body:
***Note**: This issue was originally created as [ARROW-16262](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16262). Please see the [migration documentation](https://gist.github.com/toddfarmer/12aa88361532d21902818a6044fda4c3) for further details.*

### Original Issue Description:
Caused by ARROW-7350, see discussion at https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12902#issuecomment-1102750381. Example of failing build at https://github.com/ursacomputing/crossbow/runs/6071471966?check_suite_focus=true

Upstream issue at https://github.com/JDASoftwareGroup/kartothek/issues/515

On the short term, we should also fix our nightly builds (either temporarily disabling them altogether, or ideally on skipping those failing tests)

comments.body:
***Note**: [Comment](https://issues.apache.org/jira/browse/ARROW-16262?focusedCommentId=17526347) by Joris Van den Bossche (jorisvandenbossche):*
Issue resolved by pull request 12947
<https://github.com/apache/arrow/pull/12947>
